pkgmetadata.longdescription: apexmf------.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/apexmf?color=blue :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/apexmf :alt: PyPI Version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/apexmf?color=green :target: https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause :alt: PyPI - License.. image:: https://zenodo.org/badge/304434074.svg?color=orange :target: https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/304434074`apexmf` is a set of python modules for APEX-MODFLOW model (Bailey et al., 2021) parameter estimation and uncertainty analysis with the open-source suite PEST (Doherty 2010a and 2010b, and Doherty and other, 2010)... rubric:: Installation.. code-block:: python >>> pip install apexmf.. rubric:: Brief overview of the API.. code-block:: python from apexmf import apexmf_pst_utils >>> wd = "User-APEX-MODFLOW working directory" >>> APEX_wd = "User-APEX working directory" >>> apexmf_pst_utils.init_setup(wd, APEX_wd) 'apex.parm.xlsx' file copied ... passed 'beopest64.exe' file copied ... passed 'i64pest.exe' file copied ... passed 'i64pwtadj1.exe' file copied ... passed 'forward_run.py' file copied ... passed
